item.description:
Not a hike but something the Membership might be interested in going to see...

Mountaineers, environmentalists and documentary filmmakers from around the world submit films to be judged by top people in the film and outdoor industries.

Winning films are compiled into a road show--the Banff Mountain Film Festival World Tour -- which travels to select cities around the world.

The 2 1/2- hour film showcases rock and alpine climbing, whitewater kayaking, skydiving, snowboarding, environmental issues, mountaineering and much more.

In addition to all the exciting adventure films being shown, there are prizes given away by Banff’s national sponsors at each location – including, National Geographic, Dunham Bootmakers, Patagonia, Petzl, MSR, Timex Expedition, Outdoor Research
and more!


LOCATION:
Smith Middle School
216 Addison Rd.
Glastonbury, CT

The contact for this one is Cheri!

Event fee is paid at the door, NOT to this hiking group (i.e. Don't use PayPal here to pay!). Proceeds benefit The Connecticut Audobon Society at Glastonbury Center.

group.name: The Hartford Area Hiking™ Meetup Group

item.name: Banff Mountain Film Festival
